attributes.action: take an honest stand against Hybrid Embryos and to oppose this request
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a nation we are accountable for what we will tolerate. For this generation and the generation to come please ban all studies into Hybrid Embryos human life is sacred and the money time and resources of any country should be used for good. Are we now saying that human life, people are equal to animals. Please please please stop this and oppose this -let it be known that this is outlawed in our nation.
thank you
maureen menzies

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
